title: apadooruku lOnaithinE
sahitya:
apadUruku lOnaitinE capala cittamu cEdanE 

(apadUruku)



anupallavi



E pApi nApai darEnukA E pApamu lEka 

(apadUruku)



caraNam 1



vEDukala jUDanE Idu cEdela tODanE gUDi atani mEDakEkidE vADu

nA celikADanE 

(apadUruku)



caraNam 2



sAreku sAmini dUritini gAni navvitE jAriNiyani UrivAralu vErE

pEriDi nannu pilicerE 

(apadUruku)



caraNam 3



ciruta natanuNDina biruducE guNavantudau vara tALavanE shunitO

sarasamADusu gUDitinani 

(apadUruku)
